snippet.title: Stronghold Crusader 2 - 'The Emperor & The Hermit' DLC Trailer
snippet.description:
Now Available - http://store.steampowered.com/app/349000/

The Angel of Death hovers over your castle! The Emperor & The Hermit DLC introduces two new AI opponents and an all-new Crusader Trail campaign. Spiritual successors to The Emperor and The Abbot from the original Stronghold Crusader (2002), The Emperor and The Hermit are driven entirely by religious fervour. Backed by zealots who follow their cause without question, be it just or corrupt, these new characters represent a dangerous new threat to both sides of the Crusader conflict.

The next expansion for Stronghold Crusader 2, The Emperor & The Hermit adds seven missions, two AI opponents, 10 achievements, additional player shields and new castle designs unique to The Emperor and The Hermit.

Like – https://www.facebook.com/StrongholdCrusaderII
Tweet – https://twitter.com/shcrusader2
Subscribe – http://bit.ly/fftubesub
Stream - http://bit.ly/ffstwitch
